base_description: Square object, gray and blue, modern style.
part_description: Consists of a smaller gray square centered on a larger blue rounded square base.
internal_interaction_description: The gray square is centrally affixed to the blue rounded square base, creating a layered effect. The alignment is precise, ensuring a balanced and cohesive structure, with the gray square slightly elevated from the base for a 3D appearance.
external_interaction_description: This object can be mounted on walls or surfaces, interacting with environments as a decorative or functional piece. It may serve as a switch, control panel, or aesthetic element, engaging users through touch or visual appeal.
